Description:
Detects processes setting a new DLL in DllName in under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\W32Time\TimeProvider.
Adversaries may abuse time providers to execute DLLs when the system boots.
The Windows Time service (W32Time) enables time synchronization across and within domains.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New TimeProviders Registered With Uncommon DLL Name
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\services\w32time\timeproviders%' and target_object like '%\dllname') and  not (details = '%systemroot%\system32\vmictimeprovider.dll' or details = '%systemroot%\system32\w32time.dll' or details = 'c:\windows\system32\w32time.dll'))
